directions: Mix paprika, thyme, oregano, garlic powder, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and salt in a bowl. Add plantain slices to spice mixture and turn to coat.

Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Cook plantains in skillet until softened, 1 to 2 minutes per side. Pour wine into the skillet. Bring wine to a boil and simmer until wine cooks off, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: 2 ripe (yellow) plantains, peeled and cut into 1/8-inch slices
title: Sweet Cajun Plantain
